com.asgoc.common.code

Interface CodeRepositoryAccessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcreteCodeRepositoryAccessor

    public interface CodeRepositoryAccessor
    The interface that specifies the contract for a code repository accessor.
    Author:
    Kaartic Sivaraam

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Code getCode(java.nio.file.Path location)
      Provide the Code object that represents the Code block and it's metadata found in the given location.
      java.util.Collection<Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata> getCrucialMetadata(java.nio.file.Path location)
      Provides the list of Crucial Metadata of the code found in the given path.
      void storeCode(Code code)
      The method must store the given code object to the code repository

    • Method Detail

      • storeCode

        void storeCode(Code code)
        throws InvalidCodeRepositoryOperation
        The method must store the given code object to the code repository
        Parameters:
        code - Object which contains the data that needs to be stored in the code repository.
        Throws:
        InvalidRepositoryOperation - Exception thrown in case of an Invalid repository operation.
        InvalidCodeRepositoryOperation

      • getCode

        Code getCode(java.nio.file.Path location)
      throws InvalidCodeRepositoryOperation
        Provide the Code object that represents the Code block and it's metadata found in the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location in which the Code exists.
        Returns:
        Code object that represents the code and it's metadata.
        Throws:
        InvalidRepositoryOperation - Exception thrown in case of an Invalid repository operation.
        InvalidCodeRepositoryOperation

      • getCrucialMetadata

        java.util.Collection<Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata> getCrucialMetadata(java.nio.file.Path location)
                                                                throws InvalidCodeRepositoryOperation
        Provides the list of Crucial Metadata of the code found in the given path.
        Parameters:
        location - The location (directory) for which the Crucial metadata list is to be returned.
        Returns:
        The list containing the crucial metdata list of the codes found in the given path.
        Throws:
        InvalidRepositoryOperation - Exception thrown in case of an Invalid repository operation.
        InvalidCodeRepositoryOperation
